metadata.title: CVE-2022-38090 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Improper isolation of shared resources in some Intel(R) Processors whenusing Intel(R) Software Guard Extensions may allow a privileged user topotentially enable information disclosure via local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-38090` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

intel-microcode - 3.20230214.0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20230214.0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1').
